## 

<span key="e7e2e2c3a8234090888b1c1f82732d90"><span offset-key="e7e2e2c3a8234090888b1c1f82732d90:0">Code Architecture</span></span>

##

> <span key="6ae9cc2d3e2f4ccc850e3a3c4e8ef348">*Side Effects / Asynchronous Actions*</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="aa8224ea0674410787abde4a5caf24d5"><span offset-key="aa8224ea0674410787abde4a5caf24d5:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/yelouafi/redux-saga" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0ba07a6db8c54df0b256988bc0c7fc2c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="cc4cbde49b204c3bbc5162ee7c78a928"><span data-offset-key="cc4cbde49b204c3bbc5162ee7c78a928:0">redux-saga</span></span></span></a><span key="c75ac12a56ff4871885562f4f5374b1a"><span offset-key="c75ac12a56ff4871885562f4f5374b1a:0"> - Alternative side effect model for Redux apps.</span></span>

<span key="cfb663ace6dd4c76b25bb4611467ebf0"><span offset-key="cfb663ace6dd4c76b25bb4611467ebf0:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/pburtchaell/redux-promise-middleware" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="c653933935c34516970d21b95de9af46" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="bd30e4ea5b194c069b405fddb8f9408a"><span data-offset-key="bd30e4ea5b194c069b405fddb8f9408a:0">redux-promise-middleware</span></span></span></a><span key="5f99437808c74dd7a4a0ef4ec681bc03"><span offset-key="5f99437808c74dd7a4a0ef4ec681bc03:0"> - Redux middleware for resolving and rejecting promises with conditional optimistic updates.</span></span>

<span key="bbfca4308cdf4cf0a74a7ebe278231c1"><span offset-key="bbfca4308cdf4cf0a74a7ebe278231c1:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/redux-effects/redux-effects" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e44b8630adea45d3909001669ac05ead" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="d4b651772fc846cc8faf062ded9a8e78"><span data-offset-key="d4b651772fc846cc8faf062ded9a8e78:0">redux-effects</span></span></span></a><span key="84fadc1ceae748aba85f5b347691931e"><span offset-key="84fadc1ceae748aba85f5b347691931e:0"> - You write pure functions, redux-effects handles the rest.</span></span>

<span key="0d1a510b98224ef69a5823cf24265dcf"><span offset-key="0d1a510b98224ef69a5823cf24265dcf:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/gaearon/redux-thunk" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7baac2f59306492993816c9cdd5fbd28" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="fbe9381b858040f8826b10bc13642b33"><span data-offset-key="fbe9381b858040f8826b10bc13642b33:0">redux-thunk</span></span></span></a><span key="a87afce8dbc246a29a6e4a9d39f5dc57"><span offset-key="a87afce8dbc246a29a6e4a9d39f5dc57:0"> - Thunk middleware for Redux.</span></span>

<span key="3df99e0667f74047bcd46b773e3242d5"><span offset-key="3df99e0667f74047bcd46b773e3242d5:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/makeomatic/redux-connect" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="39dbb381c9554006a4937e1ed1a92dc8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="a894b6b9d7534b77b5d39558a5fe62ea"><span data-offset-key="a894b6b9d7534b77b5d39558a5fe62ea:0">redux-connect</span></span></span></a><span key="e2aa14ed572d42ae9beb58171fe4e9bb"><span offset-key="e2aa14ed572d42ae9beb58171fe4e9bb:0"> - Provides decorator for resolving async props in react-router, extremely useful for handling server-side rendering in React.</span></span>

<span key="c5864084852c4588a841814509e376f3"><span offset-key="c5864084852c4588a841814509e376f3:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/redux-loop/redux-loop" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="86b60c8bbd494ae3aaa84088ffcee4da" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="83b96cf5e0a541eeadbeff23addb63e3"><span data-offset-key="83b96cf5e0a541eeadbeff23addb63e3:0">redux-loop</span></span></span></a><span key="6872b06fbb494afc986de04b1f1e7848"><span offset-key="6872b06fbb494afc986de04b1f1e7848:0"> - Port of elm-effects and the Elm Architecture to Redux that allows you to sequence your effects naturally and purely by returning them from your reducers.</span></span>

<span key="3f0f9341e3c04923ac0e33b5a192abd1"><span offset-key="3f0f9341e3c04923ac0e33b5a192abd1:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/salsita/redux-side-effects" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="691715ecc01844a18b68e1cb31bcb2e8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="d7f40bd6f0994f41a10322fbd3f0e301"><span data-offset-key="d7f40bd6f0994f41a10322fbd3f0e301:0">redux-side-effects</span></span></span></a><span key="7e135bcb7181483984c594641cb16f76"><span offset-key="7e135bcb7181483984c594641cb16f76:0"> - Redux toolset for keeping all the side effects inside your reducers while maintaining their purity.</span></span>

### 

<span key="d9dfe7f23ed74f9db57ddcd6ec8b129b"><span offset-key="d9dfe7f23ed74f9db57ddcd6ec8b129b:0">Routing</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="086ca0947c744306bcb347a31172e3b9"><span offset-key="086ca0947c744306bcb347a31172e3b9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/Rezonans/redux-async-connect" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="afe4c7ab569a42fd858ca7bd700ce5e6" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="cea1e559450147558b541998e111393d"><span data-offset-key="cea1e559450147558b541998e111393d:0">redux-async-connect</span></span></span></a><span key="f8cc31ae5a4f44a6b22c727b6e618e3c"><span offset-key="f8cc31ae5a4f44a6b22c727b6e618e3c:0"> - It allows you to request async data, store them in Redux state and connect them to your React component.</span></span>

    <span key="b01ed91b3dba4055a616cab23bc59d9f"><span offset-key="b01ed91b3dba4055a616cab23bc59d9f:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/Agamennon/redux-tiny-router" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a088e9e148f5498f992b448a943bb43f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="c8e04ad98a9b45ecbfe2858fda94a4a5"><span data-offset-key="c8e04ad98a9b45ecbfe2858fda94a4a5:0">redux-tiny-router</span></span></span></a><span key="4d0128b3d3ff441cbf532215e50990a5"><span offset-key="4d0128b3d3ff441cbf532215e50990a5:0"> - Router made for Redux and made for universal apps. Stop using the router as a controller, it's just state.</span></span>

## 

<span key="f7f0ffbadff04e62a8aeeaccd248be90"><span offset-key="f7f0ffbadff04e62a8aeeaccd248be90:0">Learning Material</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="ec3c1c78ea6146978913a430e7f440dc">**Redux's concepts**</span>

    <span key="504aab41b3404ebeb359e3b9a4eb5d88"><span offset-key="504aab41b3404ebeb359e3b9a4eb5d88:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="http://redux.js.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="198ff2b361344ccd947680270b5f1723" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="bcebaf97a62e4ec2b935b64b0c51b64a"><span data-offset-key="bcebaf97a62e4ec2b935b64b0c51b64a:0">Redux official documentation</span></span></span></a><span key="664a559756d34680a9bb23cd6f8069b2"><span offset-key="664a559756d34680a9bb23cd6f8069b2:0"> does a great job at explaining Redux's core principles.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="3461e45bc6294f6c949bab4e6fe29852">**Why immutable data structures**</span>

    <span key="e8e6d157df9d4313a95b45771141cc11"><span offset-key="e8e6d157df9d4313a95b45771141cc11:0">The </span></span><a href="https://facebook.github.io/react/docs/advanced-performance.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7f6bdd709c4249cc8a6220d03be20c87" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="c0f442a1499f4015be22bc56032212df"><span data-offset-key="c0f442a1499f4015be22bc56032212df:0">guide on performance</span></span></span></a><span key="295ee08334e24cedb3525a928b2e25b2"><span offset-key="295ee08334e24cedb3525a928b2e25b2:0"> of React's official documentation explains well what immutable data structures are and why they play an important role.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="30274cd208b24f1ea52b81237aff514d">**Side Effects**</span>

    <span key="ba0e829ba1e6402385ec5009ab2f0903"><span offset-key="ba0e829ba1e6402385ec5009ab2f0903:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/redux-loop/redux-loop" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="24befc6b620d4f21a0783fb22d824442" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="eec4f61a04a448859dbeb80e8e6e8960"><span data-offset-key="eec4f61a04a448859dbeb80e8e6e8960:0">Redux Loop's readme</span></span></span></a><span key="188ff83d968847129a3435e508480b00"><span offset-key="188ff83d968847129a3435e508480b00:0"> gives a good insight on Side Effects in the context of Redux.</span></span>

<span key="b7a8e6084c5c41458ac0b0215ddf9ea4"><span offset-key="b7a8e6084c5c41458ac0b0215ddf9ea4:0">Reading the aforementioned material will get you a good start for writing apps with Redux. If you are curious for more, check out following resources.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="419015c5441e4949b6f4cd8349abbf82">**Functional Programming - Basics**</span>

    <span key="7f38407570674cadbe0170cb86e7c1cd"><span offset-key="7f38407570674cadbe0170cb86e7c1cd:0">This </span></span><a href="http://jaysoo.ca/2016/01/13/functional-programming-little-ideas/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="34ddff1d11784cc5a396d5cb1a8ef23e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="7f3082e340d94ad9908b7ffcd98488e3"><span data-offset-key="7f3082e340d94ad9908b7ffcd98488e3:0">post</span></span></span></a><span key="fe72d2f8ea634795890c2ae073a81d09"><span offset-key="fe72d2f8ea634795890c2ae073a81d09:0"> goes over basic concepts of functional programming while building a YouTube instant search demo app.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="fd50e06e68ec4adb834471973e477824">**Reactive Programming**</span>

    <span key="d78b6d6aaf054e8bae21383544e0049f"><span offset-key="d78b6d6aaf054e8bae21383544e0049f:0">This </span></span><a href="https://gist.github.com/staltz/868e7e9bc2a7b8c1f754" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="77fae87e010349ffb6533c5542b029d2" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="ae97b6c742c64c50bed4af8cc67dad64"><span data-offset-key="ae97b6c742c64c50bed4af8cc67dad64:0">introduction to Reactive Programming</span></span></span></a><span key="45f82e4b2e7141638699e2415e95838d"><span offset-key="45f82e4b2e7141638699e2415e95838d:0"> explains Reactive Programming with clarity.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="e9c5f04a437c41afbe1fa7390d5dcf66">**Functional Programming - Going beyond**</span>

    <span key="b2e8a873e63d4deb8b89345cdf46a915"><span offset-key="b2e8a873e63d4deb8b89345cdf46a915:0">Well written </span></span><a href="https://medium.com/@chetcorcos/functional-programming-for-javascript-people-1915d8775504" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e61823e4f9b44ddeacfd5591fdce1faf" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="36610feb45fc41bcbedf7484f49191f9"><span data-offset-key="36610feb45fc41bcbedf7484f49191f9:0">article</span></span></span></a><span key="04d47d40f1d24631b5178c06a738fa53"><span offset-key="04d47d40f1d24631b5178c06a738fa53:0"> that talks about interesting computer science concepts implemented in functional languages and how these apply to JavaScript.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="7384e1a482a2433f9df52f412713e598">**Monads**</span>

    <span key="4c7efbb44a284d16bd6ca8846090ed1c"><span offset-key="4c7efbb44a284d16bd6ca8846090ed1c:0">Curious about monads? Wikipedia gives a good </span></span><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monad_(functional_programming)" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="22ce7025a2a6408085819f50cc6f2467" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="bd9622d4dc824f278341109de0dbe473"><span data-offset-key="bd9622d4dc824f278341109de0dbe473:0">overview on monads</span></span></span></a><span key="60d21bbfe22f42dbb4c1358d0ad28c25"><span offset-key="60d21bbfe22f42dbb4c1358d0ad28c25:0"> and </span></span><a href="http://adit.io/posts/2013-04-17-functors,_applicatives,_and_monads_in_pictures.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="c02fb6c141164cb69716402cb9b42f21" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="f89b547194164c53a17a8c54af523ef7"><span data-offset-key="f89b547194164c53a17a8c54af523ef7:0">this article</span></span></span></a><span key="dace69b4a0b04afbb91ed070ecf5b0d2"><span offset-key="dace69b4a0b04afbb91ed070ecf5b0d2:0"> explains monads in more details with graphics and simple examples.</span></span>

# 

<span key="2eb0c458826f47c3806098a4a9938e10"><span offset-key="2eb0c458826f47c3806098a4a9938e10:0">Getting Started with React Redux | React Redux</span></span>

> <span key="36a0f0248a664e36b8a2ee9900f0aac3"><span offset-key="36a0f0248a664e36b8a2ee9900f0aac3:0">Introduction &gt; Getting Started: First steps with React Redux</span></span>

<span key="1860c00a09434c9d85501f2887c0fda6"><span offset-key="1860c00a09434c9d85501f2887c0fda6:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/reduxjs/react-redux" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="14dd45461437400385339bcdc118420c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="90f6fdff9040461399d5cc1d0ba1825b"><span data-offset-key="90f6fdff9040461399d5cc1d0ba1825b:0">React Redux</span></span></span></a><span key="e1784aa05bc74ca1a3311dea994ea203"><span offset-key="e1784aa05bc74ca1a3311dea994ea203:0"> is the official </span></span><a href="https://reactjs.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="4f605e28dbca485d95a0b013e4e90c4c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="05e357d801124195b18810b7c3302311"><span data-offset-key="05e357d801124195b18810b7c3302311:0">React</span></span></span></a><span key="826a43035b5043e0bac4d8b2db6c383a"><span offset-key="826a43035b5043e0bac4d8b2db6c383a:0"> UI bindings layer for </span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="c7e30ecc7b4c4b2b934dcb0a9d306121" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="d919bcb3f4554f7392c732f7a0a6d1f8"><span data-offset-key="d919bcb3f4554f7392c732f7a0a6d1f8:0">Redux</span></span></span></a><span key="212ece479f934300852b66bb0d7c906e"><span offset-key="212ece479f934300852b66bb0d7c906e:0">. It lets your React components read data from a Redux store, and dispatch actions to the store to update state.</span></span>

## 

<span key="9f61718791364e28a5dd95e311df7ab0"><span offset-key="9f61718791364e28a5dd95e311df7ab0:0">Installation</span></span><a href="https://learning-redux42.netlify.app/#installation" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="68ab577feeab46a0a781d135bc380195" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="e1d09a10ad844de28726c1170a9e84aa"><span data-offset-key="e1d09a10ad844de28726c1170a9e84aa:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="0e6c171f35c44c7db0f2a6a5f70bb151"><span offset-key="0e6c171f35c44c7db0f2a6a5f70bb151:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

<span key="335761cdebb14a87bec0a357401743c3"><span offset-key="335761cdebb14a87bec0a357401743c3:0">React Redux 7.1+ requires </span>**React 16.8.3 or later**<span offset-key="335761cdebb14a87bec0a357401743c3:2">, in order to make use of React Hooks.</span></span>

### 

<span key="1e613a8ff2a64b8d9be87933f59a52e3"><span offset-key="1e613a8ff2a64b8d9be87933f59a52e3:0">Using Create React App</span></span><a href="https://learning-redux42.netlify.app/#using-create-react-app" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="895611017e674d07a9c4155d41e235d9" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="2666ba31eea149a99e1006fd94357dd8"><span data-offset-key="2666ba31eea149a99e1006fd94357dd8:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="a0d5104a1aba473eb7f5dc3cd5d5ae34"><span offset-key="a0d5104a1aba473eb7f5dc3cd5d5ae34:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

<span key="8ead2c09c4b5485badc2b24d1fc89d0a"><span offset-key="8ead2c09c4b5485badc2b24d1fc89d0a:0">The recommended way to start new apps with React and Redux is by using the </span></span><a href="https://github.com/reduxjs/cra-template-redux" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="895b5715565345bab70e66f3b4ec7ba1" template</span></span></span></a><span key="0c3747fb73834c16b0869f94b960983b"><span offset-key="0c3747fb73834c16b0869f94b960983b:0"> or </span></span><a href="https://github.com/reduxjs/cra-template-redux-typescript" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1fa7fb67a6cc4428a9d97f0b95392eb7" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="2220f16bbce44136b160a52f2fcb6994"><span data-offset-key="2220f16bbce44136b160a52f2fcb6994:0">Redux+TS template</span></span></span></a><span key="43a354c4c1ff4cd9bc2b332fb2d35f48"><span offset-key="43a354c4c1ff4cd9bc2b332fb2d35f48:0"> for </span></span><a href="https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9bcd3853f5f04316be3d1415ac7dd7ea" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="fcf5b71e8e8e4950af627e6d332648cd"><span data-offset-key="fcf5b71e8e8e4950af627e6d332648cd:0">Create React App</span></span></span></a><span key="2c3ab68f509b497f9509eedc8e3e0d33"><span offset-key="2c3ab68f509b497f9509eedc8e3e0d33:0">, which takes advantage of </span></span><a data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="f2f5ac87bd61494aae06c04e80a402a6"><strong>Redux Toolkit</strong></span></span></a><span key="f9e3576fafd445ca8bd0746b3012f028"><span offset-key="f9e3576fafd445ca8bd0746b3012f028:0"> and React Redux's integration with React components.</span></span>

### 

<span key="ab468d416cf446f88740d3a297adf6b4"><span offset-key="ab468d416cf446f88740d3a297adf6b4:0">An Existing React App</span></span><a href="https://learning-redux42.netlify.app/#an-existing-react-app" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="006ff3cef001449c92b4e187f00ea5e8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="6adfc8078fa44ea9982f45d72340cb9c"><span data-offset-key="6adfc8078fa44ea9982f45d72340cb9c:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="a220e5087d5640d881266f236395c420"><span offset-key="a220e5087d5640d881266f236395c420:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

<span key="ce7cfb316a964e7293c002a8f16b2f99"><span offset-key="ce7cfb316a964e7293c002a8f16b2f99:0">To use React Redux with your React app, install it as a dependency:</span></span>

<span key="84af8b370b094887af587f6e9c6e73f0"><span offset-key="84af8b370b094887af587f6e9c6e73f0:0">You'll also need to </span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/introduction/installation" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="bfa749a26ba2428da5d888c4fed2d2ef" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="07cb83ee5803438f8dffd4672bf89652"><span data-offset-key="07cb83ee5803438f8dffd4672bf89652:0">install Redux</span></span></span></a><span key="2b64ab67f07446cfb0b3206ea61c7f35"><span offset-key="2b64ab67f07446cfb0b3206ea61c7f35:0"> and </span></span><a href="https://redux.js.org/recipes/configuring-your-store/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b01b1005555d4829b22fc6f6ba760bbf" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="3ca06c5fc64d4a7c966fe0ec4a1c04e1"><span data-offset-key="3ca06c5fc64d4a7c966fe0ec4a1c04e1:0">set up a Redux store</span></span></span></a><span key="1d3887bb2cfc4518818f959210fdbf40"><span offset-key="1d3887bb2cfc4518818f959210fdbf40:0"> in your app.</span></span>

<span key="73af326f3e5c4c8699d9d40c4f1702c1"><span offset-key="73af326f3e5c4c8699d9d40c4f1702c1:0">If you are using TypeScript, the React Redux types are maintained separately in DefinitelyTyped, but included as a dependency of the </span>`react-redux`<span offset-key="73af326f3e5c4c8699d9d40c4f1702c1:2"> package, so they should be installed automatically. If you still need to install them manually, run:</span></span>

## 

<span key="299a031a535b47c199038d8b4ec7db3b"><span offset-key="299a031a535b47c199038d8b4ec7db3b:0">API Overview</span></span><a href="https://learning-redux42.netlify.app/#api-overview" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f439ecb991a0497ea5759c2144464e9a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="d0f0e6e6b90c440486ae9a9127b3621a"><span data-offset-key="d0f0e6e6b90c440486ae9a9127b3621a:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="c7ef18d0055f4c78be50f72c5327db2d"><span offset-key="c7ef18d0055f4c78be50f72c5327db2d:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

### 

<span key="86314d4e7204432fbd5b40e78f0061ac">`Provider`</span><a href="https://learning-redux42.netlify.app/#provider" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b4b270ce94de4268aab059f2fe79c4c8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="47e61ca0c63f4908b332362d7aaad726"><span data-offset-key="47e61ca0c63f4908b332362d7aaad726:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="396a1db85c9641af97ede3b403941714"><span offset-key="396a1db85c9641af97ede3b403941714:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

<span key="00d9e46df59b41de82280fb9168fefc9"><span offset-key="00d9e46df59b41de82280fb9168fefc9:0">React Redux includes a </span>`<Provider />`<span offset-key="00d9e46df59b41de82280fb9168fefc9:2"> component, which makes the Redux store available to the rest of your app:</span></span>

### 

<span key="0ef3166e4da341a4ac88c39b9125060d"><span offset-key="0ef3166e4da341a4ac88c39b9125060d:0">Hooks</span></span><a href="https://learning-redux42.netlify.app/#hooks" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7314b53a69b54f33ada636688966dbd1" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="39256c611ea543468ab706893c9b94e6"><span data-offset-key="39256c611ea543468ab706893c9b94e6:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="c9e835bf2c664721933a2be5501b5014"><span offset-key="c9e835bf2c664721933a2be5501b5014:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

<span key="26b0bc402514473eaf51d71a2db0448d"><span offset-key="26b0bc402514473eaf51d71a2db0448d:0">React Redux provides a pair of custom React hooks that allow your React components to interact with the Redux store.</span></span>

<span key="bc39a28bad8d4a05b9b230ac2815f4df">`useSelector`<span offset-key="bc39a28bad8d4a05b9b230ac2815f4df:1"> reads a value from the store state and subscribes to updates, while </span>`useDispatch`<span offset-key="bc39a28bad8d4a05b9b230ac2815f4df:3"> returns the store's </span>`dispatch`<span offset-key="bc39a28bad8d4a05b9b230ac2815f4df:5"> method to let you dispatch actions.</span></span>

## 

<span key="1d09272e93574909a3c26f8f5bff2191"><span offset-key="1d09272e93574909a3c26f8f5bff2191:0">Learning React Redux</span></span><a href="https://learning-redux42.netlify.app/#learning-react-redux" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="4d983d35bbd94a7cae88ea17483ac7dd" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="6d788a7c54754bc483cebc441d39a2f8"><span data-offset-key="6d788a7c54754bc483cebc441d39a2f8:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="1fd5fd258e1f420ab99f956d2988cf94"><span offset-key="1fd5fd258e1f420ab99f956d2988cf94:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

### 

<span key="0cd8f9c778f34a4e98602be8b076d2b9"><span offset-key="0cd8f9c778f34a4e98602be8b076d2b9:0">Learn Modern Redux Livestream</span></span><a href="https://learning-redux42.netlify.app/#learn-modern-redux-livestream" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e04a001923874f198fa2a6eb5b9a8e22" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="361fb0de360d4ddc85053c8af10b792b"><span data-offset-key="361fb0de360d4ddc85053c8af10b792b:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="0d4a5de558d04584b6ecf815447788c7"><span offset-key="0d4a5de558d04584b6ecf815447788c7:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

<span key="a11cf93107584b2f852af365face81fd"><span offset-key="a11cf93107584b2f852af365face81fd:0">Redux maintainer Mark Erikson appeared on the "Learn with Jason" show to explain how we recommend using Redux today. The show includes a live-coded example app that shows how to use Redux Toolkit and React-Redux hooks with Typescript, as well as the new RTK Query data fetching APIs.</span></span>

<span key="4ef0bad6c4954ab9969b8e5e1caafb4a"><span offset-key="4ef0bad6c4954ab9969b8e5e1caafb4a:0">The </span></span><a href="https://discord.gg/0ZcbPKXt5bZ6au5t" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="17c290fc8eb149d5af6bd442c77e184c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="8539a3ffc50b4ec3ad8483fc5ae7a432"><strong>#redux channel</strong></span></span></a><span key="24e62b3d0b5b4eeb928257cd45c8b926"><span offset-key="24e62b3d0b5b4eeb928257cd45c8b926:0"> of the </span></span><a href="http://www.reactiflux.com" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8cb912ce07d94c33b00c08c8bf8c817b" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="73c7b72bbc96423c8376b9a315c275d4"><strong>Reactiflux Discord community</strong></span></span></a><span key="87f288b608e74e87ab5d11e1deb469a3"><span offset-key="87f288b608e74e87ab5d11e1deb469a3:0"> is our official resource for all questions related to learning and using Redux. Reactiflux is a great place to hang out, ask questions, and learn - come join us!</span></span>

## 

<span key="3783b12fd3b74ec0a6e97a985a5cfcaa"><span offset-key="3783b12fd3b74ec0a6e97a985a5cfcaa:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://learning-redux42.netlify.app/#introduction" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="48dbde9ef9d845beb248a78170025a03" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="33ebd666e3ab403395c14f3d65ff8684"><span data-offset-key="33ebd666e3ab403395c14f3d65ff8684:0">Introduction</span></span></span></a><span key="25429c1efb9847b399fff465250c9c70"><span offset-key="25429c1efb9847b399fff465250c9c70:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

<span key="de7f9f1dec284a78b11644a817418f8d"><span offset-key="de7f9f1dec284a78b11644a817418f8d:0">Welcome to the Redux Essentials tutorial! </span>**This tutorial will introduce you to Redux and teach you how to use it the right way, using our latest recommended tools and best practices**<span offset-key="de7f9f1dec284a78b11644a817418f8d:2">. By the time you finish, you should be able to start building your own Redux applications using the tools and patterns you've learned here.</span></span>

<span key="e3fe151a02034c1099ec6cf35dd8ac0d"><span offset-key="e3fe151a02034c1099ec6cf35dd8ac0d:0">In Part 1 of this tutorial, we'll cover the key concepts and terms you need to know to use Redux, and in </span></span><a href="https://chrome-extension/cjedbglnccaioiolemnfhjncicchinao/tutorials/essentials/part-2-app-structure" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6182bf00cbeb4b71a177ae3ec9740424" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="255370b8d7124dddaae670d14e9deffa"><span data-offset-key="255370b8d7124dddaae670d14e9deffa:0">Part 2: Redux App Structure</span></span></span></a><span key="6699203bb84a4cad83a9eaa944016ac5"><span offset-key="6699203bb84a4cad83a9eaa944016ac5:0"> we'll examine a basic React + Redux app to see how the pieces fit together.</span></span>

<span key="2371e820f2d7405292d85e8f1d1c5ca5"><span offset-key="2371e820f2d7405292d85e8f1d1c5ca5:0">Starting in </span></span><a href="https://chrome-extension/cjedbglnccaioiolemnfhjncicchinao/tutorials/essentials/part-3-data-flow" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5e1731dae69a40a09634ee3ca5d2c999" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="5a5872ec29594dc89a6f21f9a42ac2e5"><span data-offset-key="5a5872ec29594dc89a6f21f9a42ac2e5:0">Part 3: Basic Redux Data Flow</span></span></span></a><span key="f75a2e73f44b4331b3e8625fd73a7be1"><span offset-key="f75a2e73f44b4331b3e8625fd73a7be1:0">, we'll use that knowledge to build a small social media feed app with some real-world features, see how those pieces actually work in practice, and talk about some important patterns and guidelines for using Redux.</span></span>

### 

<span key="71d587b739524ef5b7fbda6f06b90d49"><span offset-key="71d587b739524ef5b7fbda6f06b90d49:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://learning-redux42.netlify.app/#how-to-read-this-tutorial" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ce48108b180f4e73807a06dc9913e57a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-21750_259-21751-237__"><span data-key="27936a612c3c4dd3ab3986f2f3d0619a"><span data-offset-key="27936a612c3c4dd3ab3986f2f3d0619a:0">How to Read This Tutorial</span></span></span></a><span key="05bee1b3a0584eb189f9e917a9f7803e"><span offset-key="05bee1b3a0584eb189f9e917a9f7803e:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

<span key="8545bd27dc5d4ce4bffc2a55ff95f2c6"><span offset-key="8545bd27dc5d4ce4bffc2a55ff95f2c6:0">This page will focus on showing you </span>*how*<span offset-key="8545bd27dc5d4ce4bffc2a55ff95f2c6:2"> to use Redux the right way, and explain just enough of the concepts so that you can understand how to build Redux apps correctly.</span></span>

<span key="8bb7461d81044bfe98ad354a50ea1c0f"><span offset-key="8bb7461d81044bfe98ad354a50ea1c0f:0">We've tried to keep these explanations beginner-friendly, but we do need to make some assumptions about what you know already:</span></span>

<span key="289504560d48453984bed8e054e858a6">**If you're not already comfortable with those topics, we encourage you to take some time to become comfortable with them first, and then come back to learn about Redux**<span offset-key="289504560d48453984bed8e054e858a6:1">. We'll be here when you're ready!</span></span>

<span key="6f81be01ab3945efbe7ba2246b264394"><span offset-key="6f81be01ab3945efbe7ba2246b264394:0">You should make sure that you have the React and Redux DevTools extensions installed in your browser:</span></span>

    <span key="99d4fbff84ce4fcaafd0b432c77ac14e"><span offset-key="99d4fbff84ce4fcaafd0b432c77ac14e:0">Redux DevTools Extension:</span></span>
